p: If the presence of a sequence motif is not obvious, de novo motif discovery on a putative seed contig can be performed with motif discovery methods, e.g., with MEME (Bailey et al., 2015), given that this contig is long enough to harbor several occurrences of the motif. Matches of these motifs to other sequences then can be detected with MAST (Bailey et al., 2015). A wide range of applications for motif discovery and searches are available (Das and Dai, 2007) which can accommodate differing data properties and individual preference.
